title: Dynamic components example
body: You can load components from your JSON data source without explicitly
importing each template using the allComponents helper. This is an
object that holds a reference to each '.svelte' file in your project. To pull a
template out of allComponents, you need to use a component signature.
Luckily they are easy to figure out, just convert '/' and '.' characters to '_'
